title: The Monster In the Closet and Other Stories
description: This is an ACE for ASIN B01NBMZRZOGrowing up is tough. So is growing old. And everything in between? Spies, old friends, unhappy teens, grieving sisters, overworked businessmen, and novice chess players bare their struggles and triumphs in local parks, cafes, funeral homes, bus stops, even their bedrooms.
